With media publishing and telecasting irresponsibly, censorship is the need of the hour. Do you agree or disagree? Please elaborate with reasons and examples.

 

 

To some extent I agree with the statement, media publishing and telecasting are irresponsible. Media publishing and telecasting  are irresponsible because they are more worried about the news and also about the publications not about people's emotions.

They want to highlight themselves for that reason they will telecast the news covered irrespective of the public opinion. This in turn cause damage to the society.Media publications and telecasting are more eager to cover the news and want to be a brand. Main motive of them is to gain public interests towards their publications and to be market leaders.They should think about the society.

Let's take an example of the rape case, in this case media  tries to cover as much as possible information in order to publish and doesn't care about the girl and tries to get an appointmnet for an interview with the girl in order to get complete information about the incident but doesn't bother about the girl's feelings. They also try to gather information from her parents. Telecasts all the inforamtion covered which in turn would affect the girl's feelings.

Telecasting the news is not the wrong thing but this kind of news should not be highlighted much.They should convey the message to the public in a positive tone rather than highlighting the news and should take some responsibility of creating awareness among the people and make them  feel responsible.They should publish and telecast the news which benefits the viewer.

For example the advertisement of a cigarette attracts the viewer's to smoke but doesn't tell the facts that it ruins the life.According to me media publications and telecasting should take some responsibility and telecast the things that creates awareness among the viewer and also warn them about the dangers/problems they are going to face because of the addiction. This kind of information should be telecasted atleast twice in a day.
